channel.title: Peas on Enjoyable Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Peas on Enjoyable Recipes

item.title: Matar Paneer
item.description: Paneer remains my all time favorite. When I was a kid (I am not one now despite what my mom wants me to believe), mom always made a paneer dish once a day. Lunch always used to contain fish, which is obvious as we were a typical Bengali family, but on Saturdays it was no fish. Instead we had a paneer dish. As far as I was concerned for me it made no difference.
